import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, NavItem, Modal, Button, FormGroup, FormControl, ControlLabel} from 'react-bootstrap'; import './NavBar.css'; export default class NaviBar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleLoginShow = this.handleLoginShow.bind(this); this.handleLoginClose = this.handleLoginClose.bind(this); this.handleSignupShow = this.handleSignupShow.bind(this); this.handleSignupClose = this.handleSignupClose.bind(this); this.state = { loginShow: false, signupShow: false }; } handleLoginClose() { this.setState({ loginShow: false }); } handleLoginShow() { this.setState({ loginShow: true }); } handleSignupClose() { this.setState({ signupShow: false }); } handleSignupShow() { this.setState({ signupShow: true }); } render(props) { return ( Knights Arcade
Games My Profile Submit About {/* Action Another action Something else here Separated link */}

); } }
